page.title: 04RUDDINGTON MUSEUMS
page.content: The {RUDDINGTON HISTORY SOCIETY}was founded by a group of people in 1970 led by{Mrs.Shrimpton}the vicar's wife. They have started three museums.The { {FRAMEWORK KNITTING COMPLEX,}the {HERMITAGE }and the{ST.PETER'S ROOMS. The last show life as it was .The { {HERMITAGE}is the oldest building in {RUDDINGTON}and as you arrive you see a signpost which used to be at the turnpike crossroads.As you open the door there is a collection of Victorian kitchen items including a tin bath and London soap. The {FLAWFORTH }room has finds from the digging at the siteand in NOTTINGHAM CASTLE MUSEUM are the famous{RUDDINGTON}alabasters. There is also a record room with results from studying the census returns and old photographs.
